    • Method Detail

      • getAspectRatio

        public double getAspectRatio()
        The aspect ratio of the target bounding rectangle. A good score should approach the width / height of the actual bounding rectangle of your target.
        Returns:
        The width / height of the target bounding rectangle.

      • getCoverageArea

        public double getCoverageArea()
        The coverage area of the target. A good score should approach the coverage area of your target as the following ratio (area target)/(area bounding rectangle).
        Returns:
        The area of the target divided by the area of the bounding rectangle.

      • toRobotFrame

        public PolarCoordinate toRobotFrame(Position offsetFromCenter,
                                    double rotationAngle)
        Calculates the position of the target from the robot's frame of reference
        Parameters:
        offsetFromCenter - The camera's offset from the center (in the same units as the target dimensions)
        rotationAngle - The angle that the camera is rotated from the front of the robot in degrees.
        Returns:
        The polar coordinates (angle and distance) of the target from the center of the robot.

      • toRobotFrame

        public PolarCoordinate toRobotFrame(Position offsetFromCenter)
        Calculates the position of the target from the robot's frame of reference
        Parameters:
        offsetFromCenter - The camera's offset from the center (in the same units as the target dimensions)
        Returns:
        The polar coordinates (angle and distance) of the target from the center of the robot.
